casebody.data:
No. 10-826. Guy Pierce, Warden, Petitioner v. Henry Griffin. 562 U.S. 1250, 131 S. Ct. 1507,

179 L. Ed. 2d 360,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1120. February 22, 2011.

Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Petition for writ of certiorari *361to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 622 F.3d 831.
